channel.title: Please some one help me
channel.description: How do i disable stake for admins anyone know help please.

item.title: Please some one help me
item.dc:creator: @devenb123 devenb123
item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

Go to the duel file because I don’t know what fucking revision you are using. Now find the staking option, add an else if statement playerrights == 2 or whatever and don’t allow the admin to do it… For example (won’t work)

public static void stake() { if (playerrights <=1){ Player.startstake; BLA BLA BLA; } else if (playerrights ==2){ Player.sendmessage("You can't stake fucktard"); } }

obv not real code… Just an example of how to use the if statements.

Read full topic
